item.description:
Details have changed:

The bars and times have changed and will likely change again so please check back before you leave the house to come on the crawl. The 18th is turning out to be a busy day, so if a bar is over capacity, just head to the next one and wait for the group.

 

2PM - Purple Shamrock

Special: Miller HL $1.50 (pint)

3PM - Hennessy's 

Special: Shipyard $3.00

4-6PM Hong Kong Boston (NOTE THIS IS A TWO HOUR STOP)

Special: $1.75 Coors Lite

6PM - Coogans

7PM - Jose McYntire's
item.how_to_find_us: At the bar like a true alcoholic
item.name: Valentine's Day Sucks Pub Crawl
